00003 /**
00004  * @brief HTML list class.
00005  * 
00006  * This class is used as a base class for all list elements.
00007  * 
00008  * @class       Boo_Html_List
00009  * @license     http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt GNU General Public License
00010  * @link        http://code.ramaboo.com/ Boo Framework
00011  * @copyright   2009 David Singer
00012  * @author      David Singer <david@ramaboo.com>
00013  * @version     2.0.1
00014  */
00015 
00016 class Boo_Html_List extends Boo_Html {
00017     
00018     /**
00019      * @brief List items array.
00020      */
00021     protected $lis = array();
00022     
00023     /**
00024      * @brief Default constructor.
00025      * @param string $element The HTML element to create.
00026      * @return void.
00027      */
00028     public function __construct($element) {
00029         parent::__construct($element);
00030     }
00031     
00032     /**
00033      * @brief Merges list items from another list into this list.
00034      * @return int Returns number of items merged.
00035      * @param Boo_Html_List $list The list object to merge.
00036      */
00037     public function merge(Boo_Html_List $list) {
00038         $count = 0;
00039         foreach ($list->getLis() as $key => $value) {
00040             $this->addLi($value);
00041             $count++;
00042         }
00043         return $count;
00044     }
00045     
00046     /**
00047      * @brief Adds a list item.
00048      * 
00049      * @param mixed $li The list item to add.
00050      * @return bool Returns index of item.
00051      */
00052     public function addLi($li) {
00053         
00054         
00055         if ($li instanceof Boo_Html_Li) {
00056             $this->lis[] = $li;
00057         } else {
00058             $tmpLi = new Boo_Html_Li;
00059             $tmpLi->setContent($li);
00060             $this->lis[] = $tmpLi;
00061         }
00062         
00063         return count($this->lis) -1;
00064     }
00065         
00066     /**
00067      * @brief Removes a list item.
00068      * 
00069      * @param int $index The list item index.
00070      * @return bool Returns TRUE on success, FALSE otherwise.
00071      */
00072     public function removeLi($index) {
00073         $index = (int) $index;
00074         if (array_key_exists($index, $this->lis)) {
00075             unset($this->lis[$index]);
00076             return true;
00077         } else {
00078             return false;
00079         }
00080     }
00081     
00082     /**
00083      * @brief Removes a list item.
00084      * 
00085      * Removes all list items with a specific class.
00086      * 
00087      * @param string $class The search class.
00088      * @return bool Returns TRUE if a list item was removed, FALSE otherwise.
00089      */
00090     public function removeLiByClass($class) {
00091         $class = trim($class);
00092         $result = false;
00093         foreach ($this->lis as $key => $value) {
00094             if ($value->hasClass($class)) {
00095                 unset($this->lis[$key]);
00096                 $result = true;
00097             }
00098         }
00099         return $result;
00100     }
00101     
00102     /**
00103      * @brief Sets a list item.
00104      * 
00105      * @param Boo_Html_Li $li The list item object.
00106      * @param int $index The list item index.
00107      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00108      */
00109     public function setLi($li, $index) {
00110         $index = (int) $index;
00111         if ($li instanceof Boo_Html_Li) {
00112             $this->lis[$index] = $li;
00113         } else {
00114             $tmpLi = new Boo_Html_Li;
00115             $tmpLi->setContent($li);
00116             $this->lis[$index] = $tmpLi;
00117         }
00118         
00119         return true;
00120     }
00121     
00122     /**
00123      * @brief Returns a list item.
00124      * 
00125      * @param int $index The list item index.
00126      * @return Boo_Html_Li The list item object on success, FALSE otherwise.
00127      */
00128     public function getLi($index) {
00129         $index = (int) $index;
00130         if (array_key_exists($index, $this->lis)) {
00131             return $this->lis[$index];
00132         } else {
00133             return false;
00134         }
00135     }
00136     
00137     /**
00138      * @brief Gets a list item by HTML ID.
00139      * @return Boo_Html_Li The list item object with the given ID, FALSE if not found.
00140      * @param string $id The search ID;
00141      */
00142     public function getLiById($id) {
00143         $id = trim($id);
00144         foreach ($this->lis as $key => $value) {
00145             if ($value->getAttr('id') == $id) {
00146                 return $value;
00147             }
00148         }
00149         return false;
00150     }
00151     
00152     /**
00153      * @brief Gets a list items index by HTML ID.
00154      * @return int The list items index if found, FALSE if not found.
00155      * @param string $id The search id;
00156      */
00157     public function getLiIndexById($id) {
00158         $id = trim($id);
00159         foreach ($this->lis as $key => $value) {
00160             if ($value->getAttr('id') == $id) {
00161                 return $key;
00162             }
00163         }
00164         return false;
00165     }
00166     
00167     /**
00168      * @brief Removes a list item by HTML ID.
00169      * @return bool Returns TRUE if item was found and removed, FALSE otherwise.
00170      * @param string $id The search id;
00171      */
00172     public function removeLiById($id) {
00173         $id = trim($id);
00174         foreach ($this->lis as $key => $value) {
00175             if ($value->getAttr('id') == $id) {
00176                 unset($this->lis[$key]);
00177                 return true;
00178             }
00179         }
00180         return false;
00181     }
00182     
00183     /**
00184      * @brief Retuns all list items.
00185      * 
00186      * @return array Array of Boo_Html_Li objects.
00187      */
00188     public function getLis() { return $this->lis; }
00189     
00190     /**
00191      * @brief Clears all list items.
00192      * @return bool Function always returns TRUE.
00193      */
00194     public function clearLis() { $this->lis = array(); return true; }
00195     
00196     /**
00197      * @brief Returns list items count.
00198      * 
00199      * @return int Number of list items.
00200      */
00201     public function getCount() { return count($this->lis); }
00202     
00203     /**
00204      * @brief Returns number of list items with a given class.
00205      * 
00206      * Will return zero if no items are found.
00207      * 
00208      * @return int Returns number of list items with a given class.
00209      * @param string $class The search class.
00210      */
00211     public function getCountByClass($class) {
00212         $class = trim($class);
00213         $count = 0;
00214         foreach ($this->lis as $key => $value) {
00215             if ($value->hasClass($class)) {
00216                 $count++;
00217             }
00218         }
00219         return $count;
00220     }
00221     
00222     /**
00223      * @brief Determines if list items is empty.
00224      * 
00225      * @return bool Returns TRUE if list items is empty, FALSE otherwise.
00226      */
00227     public function isEmpty() { return empty($this->lis); }
00228     
00229     /**
00230      * @brief Returns a dummy list item.
00231     * 
00232      * This is used as a place holder for empty lists so they are valid xhtml.
00233      * 
00234      * @return Boo_Html_Li A dummy list item.
00235      * @param array $attrs[optional] Array of attributes.
00236      */
00237     public function htmlDummyLi(array $attrs = array()) {
00238         $li = new Boo_Html_Li;
00239         $li->applyAttrs($attrs);
00240         $li->addClass('dummy');
00241         
00242         return $li;
00243     }
00244     
00245     /** 
00246      * @brief Returns html.
00247      * 
00248      * @param array $attrs[optional] Array of attributes.
00249      * @return string HTML for the element.
00250      */
00251     public function html(array $attrs = array()) {
00252         
00253         // list is empty return dummy item
00254         if ($this->isEmpty()) {
00255             $this->appendContent($this->htmlDummyLi());
00256             return parent::html($attrs);
00257         }
00258         
00259         $count = 1; // must start with 1 not 0
00260         $listCount = $this->getCount();
00261         
00262         $this->clearContent();
00263         foreach ($this->lis as $key => $value) {
00264             // helps with pass by reference issues
00265             $tmpValue = clone $value;
00266             
00267             // add classes if need
00268             if ($count == 1) {
00269                 $tmpValue->addClass('first-child');
00270             }
00271             
00272             if ($count == $listCount) {
00273                 // if array has one item then it will have both classes, this is good
00274                 $tmpValue->addClass('last-child');
00275             }
00276             
00277             $this->appendContent($tmpValue);
00278             $count++;
00279         }
00280         return parent::html($attrs);
00281     }
00282 }
